chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 is having the following problem:
The delivery was supposed to be tomorrow but the delivery guy wants to deliver today and I'm not there, what should I do?

Thank you for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

Following the situation, I carried out a check on the carrier’s site but it does not work.

Could you tell us more about this situation?

Sincerely,
Fanny, Back Market Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link https://trace.dpd.fr/trace/10694000293292, the customer should have received their parcel on 31 May.

Regards,
RK

Dear Backcare,

The parcel had arrived on 31/05. Kindly check if the customer has received it. Thank you for your cooperation.

Regards,
AS

Hi ecomobile,

I acknowledge receipt of your message.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Sincerely,
Fanny, Back Market Customer Service
